title: What Does the 🤫🧏‍♂️ Mewing Emoji Combo Mean on Social Media?

steps.title: The 🤫🧏‍♂️ emoji combo represents mewing and looksmaxxing in general.
steps.content: The 🤫🧏‍♂️ emoji combo represents mewing and looksmaxxing in general. Also called the “bye bye mewing shh” emoji combo, the mewing emoji combo pairs the 🤫 (shushing face) emoji with the 🧏‍♂️ (Deaf person) emoji. Mewing is a tongue exercise believed to improve your jawline, and this emoji combo means you can’t open your mouth to talk because you’re mewing. [1] X Research source “Leveling up 🤫🧏‍♂️” “Face card never declines 🤫🧏‍♂️” “The secret to the perfect jawline: 🤫🧏‍♂️”

steps.title: Use 🤫🧏‍♂️ to represent mewing or draw attention to your appearance.
steps.content: Use 🤫🧏‍♂️ to represent mewing or draw attention to your appearance. Whether you’ve been hitting the gym, sticking to a skincare routine, or finding little ways to level up in looks, 🤫🧏‍♂️ signals dedication and consistency in your looksmaxxing journey. It means you’re making an effort to improve your appearance and it’s paying off. “Putting in that work 🤫🧏‍♂️” “My side profile >>> 🤫🧏‍♂️” “Mogging everyone in the room 🤫🧏‍♂️”

steps.title: Use 🤫🧏‍♂️ in the caption of a glow up transformation video.
steps.content: Use 🤫🧏‍♂️ in the caption of a glow up transformation video. Since this emoji combo represents mewing and self-improvement in general, add it to the caption of a glow up (or self-improvement) video on social media. It’s the perfect way to convey growth, confidence, and personal development! “2023 ➡️ 2024 🤫🧏‍♂️” “What’s my secret? 🤫🧏‍♂️” “Eat, sleep, mog, repeat 🤫🧏‍♂️”

steps.title: Respond with an amazed or excited smiley emoji to be supportive.
steps.content: Respond with an amazed or excited smiley emoji to be supportive. If you want to hype your friends up on social media, comment an awestruck emoji to tell them they’re attractive. Sending an emoji is the perfect way to reply when you can’t think of the right words. “🤩🤩🤩” “Okkkk 😍” “🔥🥵🔥🥵”

steps.title: Reply with a compliment to make the other person feel good.
steps.content: Reply with a compliment to make the other person feel good. It takes courage to upload content about your physical appearance online, so if your friend posts a glow up or self-improvement video, give them a compliment to brighten their day. Just keep your comment short and sweet to avoid making them uncomfortable. “Wowza!” “GORG!!!!!” “You look so pretty <3”

steps.title: The 🤫🧏‍♂️ emoji combo gained popularity on TikTok in May 2023.
steps.content: The 🤫🧏‍♂️ emoji combo gained popularity on TikTok in May 2023. Creators would post videos of their glow ups and other looksmaxxing content, with Lumi Athena’s song “ICEW****!” as the audio. In many videos, people put their finger up to their mouth to make a “shh” face, while pointing at their jawline to say they’re mogging the viewer with their mewing. [2] X Research source The 🤫 (shushing face) emoji indicates that the user can’t open their mouth because they’re mewing.

steps.title: There are tons of emojis related to mogging and self-improvement.
steps.content: There are tons of emojis related to mogging and self-improvement. From the moai emoji to the person lifting weights emoji, there are endless ways to talk about your looksmaxxing journey. Use any of the following options when 🤫🧏‍♂️ isn’t cutting it for you: 🗿 (moai) 🚀 (rocket) 💡 (light bulb) ⚡ (high voltage) 🥊 (boxing glove) 💪 (flexed biceps) 🗣 (speaking head) 🔱 (trident emblem) 📈 (chart increasing) 🏋️ (person lifting weights)
